title: Adrianna Papell Women's One Shoulder Jacquard Gown
description: Romantic florals abound on the luxe fabrication of this mermaid gown
This formal dress features a one shoulder neckline, fitted bodice with pleated details, and mermaid skirt
A draped ruffle detail flows gracefully from the waist to the skirt, while a side zipper closure provides a seamless finish to this dress.
Crafted from metallic floral jacquard fabric, thisevening gown is an elegant look from formal weddings to black-tie galas
This dress runs large; we recommend sizing down for the best fit.

Romantic florals abound on the luxe fabrication of this mermaid gown. This formal dress features a one shoulder neckline, fitted bodice with pleated details, and mermaid skirt. A draped ruffle detail cascades from the waist to the skirt. Crafted from metallic floral jacquard fabric, thisevening gown is an elegant look from formal weddings to black-tie galas. A zipper closure at the side completes this dress. A nude heel and sequin clutch are the perfect additions to this floral mermaid gown.
